data.name: VigilanteX
data.description:
VigilanteX builds true site intelligence machines that do more than monitor, they think, respond, and deliver real-time insight where it matters most.

At the core of every unit is Agenic AI, transforming raw visual data into actionable intelligence. It delivers the same operational clarity as a project manager, safety coordinator, and security officer — all working simultaneously, without a break. 

Beyond those roles, our systems support logistics teams, compliance officers, risk managers, and executives with data that drives smarter decisions across the organization. Whether it's reducing liability, improving productivity, or safeguarding assets, VigilanteX delivers value across the entire operational stack.

Our flagship systems — Argos and LunaVue — are engineered to dominate in the most demanding environments:

Argos acts as the command center of the job site, providing comprehensive oversight and total visibility across large-scale operations.

LunaVue eliminates blind spots with targeted coverage in high-risk corridors, staging zones, and low-visibility areas.

Built from raw steel in Texas and battle-tested in the field, VigilanteX units thrive in the harshest conditions while delivering measurable ROI.

This isn’t surveillance. It’s next-gen operational intelligence.

updates.description:
This Halloween, Argos reminds us that even the most elusive trespassers can't outrun its sites.

Argos combines night vision cameras and real-time anomaly detection to identify threats with precision day or night, costume or cryptid. When Bigfoot crossed the perimeter, Argos didn’t blink. It tracked movement and triggered alerts in milliseconds.

No myths. No missed detections. Just machine learning models trained on thousands of hours of perimeter breach scenarios optimized for accuracy, speed, and zero false positives.

Whether it’s folklore or a real threat, Argos keeps watch.

🏌️♂️ Huge thanks to VigilanteX for the invite to the golf tournament.

What really stood out? Their cutting-edge security camera system powered by integrated AI, designed to detect hazards and risks in real time. 

As a safety professional, I’m always looking for ways to elevate protection and prevention, and this is it:

🔐 Safety meets Innovation meets AI. This is safety at its best.

Appreciate the opportunity to connect and learn more about how VigilanteX is reshaping the future of workplace safety. Looking forward to what’s next!

Paul Unterhalter

#SafetyInnovation #AIForSafety #Vigilantex #WorkplaceSafety #Gratitude #SafetyLeadership

Some days in startups feel small.
You are deep in code reviews, bug fixes, and Slack threads.

Then you have days that remind you why you started building in the first place.

This week was one of those days. I spent time with our partners at VigilanteX, who are helping bring AI into the physical world.

Cody Gross used to build cars at Tesla. Now he is building hardware that gives AI eyes. Watching him and Aaron Wallace work reminded me that the best innovation happens when people who have built real things start solving new problems. 

They do not overthink. They just build.

The most powerful part of this partnership is not the technology. It is the mindset. When a customer brings an impossible problem, they don’t look for reasons it cannot work. They roll up their sleeves and figure it out.

That is what it takes to bring AI into the real world. People who care deeply, think practically, and are not afraid to get their hands dirty.

Every time I leave days like this, I feel grounded. This is why I love building for the physical world. It keeps you honest. It keeps you learning. And it reminds you that progress is built one solved problem at a time.

Built in America. Built to last. Built for the physical world.

It’s finally here, this Thursday!

This week, the green becomes your arena and the stakes are high. Whether you're chasing that elusive hole-in-one or just vibing with your crew.

Expect fierce competition. Real connections. Unforgettable moments.

From epic drives to belly laughs, every swing tells a story. So rally your squad, lace up those spikes, and bring the energy.

Trophy or not, you’re playing for glory, camaraderie, and pure love of the sport. This is your moment. Your course. Your game.

Game face: ON. Let’s tee off in style

#SwingForGlory #GameOn #VigilanteXOpen2025

OpenAI launched Sora 2 yesterday.

For our customers, the question isn’t “How do I generate better videos?” - it’s “How will this help me run my factory, store, or supply chain more effectively?”

After speaking with customers and hearing from leaders like Sam Altman, one theme stood out: the future of AI isn’t confined to screens. It’s in the physical environments where people work every day.

That’s where the real opportunity lies.

More to come.

Can you spot the safety risk?

Equipped with HD cameras that zoom in from half a mile away, Argos uses AI-powered vision to detect safety risks that the human eye might miss, like missing fall protection on elevated work zones. By combining long-range clarity with intelligent analysis, Argos helps prevent injuries before they happen.

Smart tech. Safer sites. That’s the Argos advantage.

#AI #ConstructionSafety #FallPrevention #SurveillanceTech #WorksiteSafety #ArgosUnit #SmartSecurity

What an amazing time at the #ASSP Arizona chapter event.
Such a privileged to spend time with some true #safety heroes especially my long time friend and safety legend #AmberPappas.
Thank you to #Vigilantex our commitment to #A.I and #Safety is never ending, and we are so grateful to have been part of this event.
#ASSP
#ArizonaSafety
#SafetyProfessionals
#SafetyLeadership
#WorkplaceSafety
#Willmeng
#ChasseBuilders
#ArizonaStateUniversity
#Skanska

Construction sites are vulnerable after hours, unguarded perimeters, high-value equipment, and limited visibility. That’s where Argos steps in.

Intelligence by Spot AI, built for mobility, Argos detects unauthorized access in real time, even in low-light or remote conditions. Night vision-enabled surveillance, perimeter breach detection, instant alerts to site managers and security teams.

Whether it’s a trespasser, a curious wanderer, or something more serious, Argos sees it, flags it, and helps stop it before damage is done.

Because protecting your site never rests.

#ArgosOnSite #ConstructionSecurity #IntrusionPrevention #SmartSurveillance #SiteSafety

We’re honored to welcome Lieutenant General (Ret.) Lori Reynolds to the VigilanteX Board of Advisors.

Lori brings 35 years of service in the United States Marine Corps, culminating as the Deputy Commandant for Information; a groundbreaking role that elevated the strategic importance of information, cyberspace, and emerging warfighting domains like space and digital technologies.

In this role, she led the development of the Marine Corps’ newest warfighting function, built the cyberspace occupational field, and helped launch a new Marine component for U.S. Space Command. Her leadership shaped the future of military operations across IT, intelligence, cyber, space, and influence capabilities.

Since retiring, Lori has continued to make an impact; serving on the boards of U.S. Bancorp, American Public University System, Marine Corps University, Naval Academy Athletic & Scholarship Program and the Marine Corps Scholarship Foundation. Her legacy is one of transformation, resilience, and strategic foresight.

We’re thrilled to have her expertise guiding our mission at VigilanteX.

#Leadership #Cybersecurity #VeteranLeadership #MarineCorps #AI #Innovation

We are thrilled to welcome Lawrence X. Taylor  NACD.DC to the VigilanteX Board of Advisors.

Lawrence brings more than 30 years of executive and boardroom leadership, having served on over 15 public and private company boards across industries including manufacturing, aviation, real estate, healthcare, retail, and hospitality. A recognized SEC-qualified financial expert, he has guided organizations through restructurings, acquisitions, and capital transactions totaling more than $20 billion .

Currently President of Taylor Strategy Group, Lawrence advises companies on strategy, finance, and governance, while also serving as an Executive-in-Residence for the MBA program at Arizona State University’s W.P. Carey School of Business. His deep expertise in corporate governance, strategy, and financial operations will be invaluable as VigilanteX scales its impact in the AI-powered site intelligence and mobile surveillance market.

Please join us in welcoming Lawrence Taylor to the VigilanteX family!

#VigilanteX #BoardOfAdvisors #Leadership #AI #Innovation #SiteIntelligence

We are pleased to welcome Jerome Snyder to the VigilanteX Board of Advisors.

A proud Nevadan since 1964 with roots in Los Angeles, Jerome brings an exceptional blend of academic and professional experience to the VigilanteX team. He holds degrees from UCLA (Business), UC Berkeley (JD), and the University of San Diego (Tax Law). Over the years, Jerome has served as Honorary Consul to the United Kingdom, contributed to Senator Harry Reid’s Hi-Tech Work Group, and advised on Governor Gibbons’ Sage Commission.

His career spans a wide range of industries including real estate development, non-restricted gaming, healthcare, banking, finance, and telecommunication, each marked by his strategic insight and leadership.

Welcome to VigilanteX, Jerome!

Severe storm over Tempe, Arizona today. VigilanteX stayed locked in while the storm tore through. 

** This storm was not ordinary. Our thoughts are with all who have been affected or displaced by this event.  Stay safe out there **

#ArizonaStorm #Tempe #SevereWeather #VigilanteX #Spotai

The countdown is on October 9th, Gray Rock Golf Club becomes the epicenter of excellence.

Whether you're a seasoned golfer or a strategic thinker who thrives on meaningful connections, this is your invitation to a day that blends precision, prestige, and purpose. The VigilanteX Open isn’t just about the game it’s about the people who play it. Enjoy the serene beauty of Gray Rock’s championship course and forge partnerships that last beyond the 18th hole.

From tee-off to toast, every moment is designed to inspire. Limited spots available DM us to claim yours before they’re gone.

#VigilanteXOpen #GameOnLeadership #GolfAndGrowth

Struck-by injuries remain one of the deadliest hazards on construction sites; but they’re also among the most preventable.

With heavy equipment, moving vehicles, and falling tools, every second counts. That’s where Argos steps in. By providing real-time monitoring, hazard detection, and proactive alerts, Argos helps crews stay aware, stay protected, and stay alive.

Safety isn’t just a protocol; it’s a promise. Let’s build smarter, safer sites together. Safety is no accident.

#ConstructionSafety #StruckByHazards #WorksiteProtection #SafetyFirst #InjuryPrevention

Mark your calendars VigilanteX Open 2025 is teeing off October 9th at the breathtaking Gray Rock Golf Club!

Get ready to swing into a day where business brilliance meets golfing finesse. Join top industry leaders, passionate golf enthusiasts, and community changemakers for an unforgettable experience on the green.

This isn’t just a tournament, it’s a celebration of competition, connection, and camaraderie. Expect elevated play, exceptional hospitality, and the kind of networking that only happens over fairways and fresh air.

Spots are limited, so send us a private message to secure your place.

#GolfTournament #LeadershipInMotion #VigilanteXOpen

We've developed a way to deploy real-world AI anywhere in the world!

Instead of digging through hours of footage, our on-prem AI system and natural language interface let you simply ask a question and get the answer.

Imagine being able to ask your cameras:
"Did crews wear PPE in Zone 2 this morning?"
"Show me all work that happened near the trench today."
"How many concrete trucks came on site today?"

This is about turning a passive tool into an active partner that helps drive projects forward, improve safety, and streamline operations.
#AI #Innovation #Technology #ProjectManagement #Safety #ConstructionTech

Today, we recognize the incredible dedication, grit, and heart our team brings to VigilanteX. Your hard work doesn’t just keep things running, it drives innovation, builds community, and makes this place something truly special. We see the late nights, the early mornings, the extra mile you go, and we couldn’t be more grateful.

Enjoy this well-deserved break, you’ve earned it. Thank you for all that you do.

Happy Labor Day!

#LaborDay #TeamAppreciation #Gratitude

We’re counting down the days until our upcoming tournament and we couldn’t be more excited about the venue!

Here’s a sneak peek of the stunning course where it all goes down. Whether you're swinging for the win or just soaking in the views, it's going to be a day to remember.

Send us a private message to register.

#GolfTournament #GolfLife #Networking

When it comes to rugged reliability, the Argos unit sets the gold standard.

Built to withstand the harshest environments. From scorching heat to heavy downpours, Argos is more than just a surveillance trailer. It’s a fortress on wheels. With infrared starlight night vision, HD PTZ cameras with 25x zoom, and 24/7 remote access, it delivers uncompromising performance no matter the conditions.

Whether you're managing a remote job site or safeguarding critical infrastructure, Argos is designed to be always on duty; resilient, portable, and ready to deploy at a moment’s notice. It’s not just tough; it’s VigilanteX tough.

#SiteSecurity #Durability #RemoteMonitoring #SurveillanceSolutions #MonsoonSeason

We're excited to announce the promotion of Montee Banai, MBA, MSL to the Director of Channel Sales!

From his time as Sales Manager, Montee has consistently demonstrated strategic vision, deep industry insight, and a relentless drive to build strong partnerships. His leadership has not only elevated our channel strategy but also inspired the team to reach new heights.

This next chapter is a testament to his hard work, integrity, and ability to turn challenges into opportunities. Excited to see how Montee will continue shaping the future of VigilanteX’s channel ecosystem!

#Leadership #Promotion #TeamWins

We’re thrilled to announce the VigilanteX open 2025, happening on October 9th  at the stunning Gray Rock Golf Club.

Join industry leaders, golf enthusiasts, and community partners for a day of competition, connection, and celebration on the green.

Where business meets sport, and relationships are forged over fairways and finesse, this is more than a tournament, it’s an experience.

For those joining us, prepare for a day of elevated competition, refined hospitality, and meaningful connection.

Send us a private message to register.

#GolfTournament #LeadershipInMotion #TeeTime2025

We had an incredible experience at the VPPPA, Inc. conference this year. It was a privilege to be surrounded by so many dedicated professionals who share a deep commitment to advancing workplace safety.

Our Director of Safety Innovation, Paul Unterhalter, had the honor of interviewing Jack Robinson, member of the National Board of Directors for VPPPA. Their conversation highlighted the power of collaboration and leadership in driving meaningful change across industries.

Being in the presence of passionate safety advocates is always inspiring; and a reminder of why we do what we do. Thank you to everyone who made this event a success.

We had an incredible experience at the VPPPA, Inc. conference this year. It was a privilege to be surrounded by so many dedicated professionals who share a deep commitment to advancing workplace safety.

Our Director of Safety Innovation, Paul Unterhalter, had the honor of interviewing Jack Robinson, member of the National Board of Directors for VPPPA. Their conversation highlighted the power of collaboration and leadership in driving meaningful change across industries.

Being in the presence of passionate safety advocates is always inspiring; and a reminder of why we do what we do. Thank you to everyone who made this event a success.

We’re proud to announce that Paul Unterhalter has been promoted to Director of Safety Innovation at VigilanteX.

Since joining our team, Paul has brought exceptional expertise in safety awareness and a deep commitment to empowering others to recognize and mitigate risks in their roles. His impact has been felt across the organization, and his passion for creating a safer, smarter workplace continues to inspire.
We’re incredibly grateful for Paul’s leadership and vision, and we’re excited to see how he shapes the future of safety innovation in this new role.

Please join us in congratulating Paul on this well-earned promotion!

Paul, your dedication inspires us all. Here’s to continued success and bold innovation at VigilanteX.

A little over a week ago, we had the honor of attending the 2025 Veterans Village of San Diego 37th Annual Stand Down; an inspiring event dedicated to supporting America’s unhoused and at-risk veterans.

We met incredible individuals who pour their hearts into this mission, offering hope, dignity, and real pathways to healing. Their commitment reminds us that community is built through compassion and action.

Thank you, VVSD, and every volunteer, advocate, and veteran who makes this movement possible. Your work changes lives and we’re proud to stand beside you.

#VVSD #StandDown2025 #VeteranSupport #CommunityMatters
We're #hiring a new Staff Accountant in Tempe, Arizona. Apply today or share this post with your network.

We are pleased to announce that Matt Carroll will be transitioning from Board of Advisors into a new role as a member of our Board of Directors.

Matt brings a wealth of experience, strategic vision, and deep industry insight that will be invaluable as we continue to grow and evolve. His thoughtful leadership and proven ability to navigate complex challenges make him an exceptional addition to our board. We look forward to the guidance and perspective he will bring and we're thrilled to have him in this role.

Live at VPPPA, Inc. Safety+! 
Come see us August 11th - August 14th at Booth #235 and discover how VigilanteX is redefining site safety with rugged site intelligence trailers!


📍 Booth 235 – Don’t just hear about it, experience it.

#VPPPA #SafetyPlus #VigilanteX #WorkplaceSafety #AIPoweredSafety

We’re thrilled to announce BF Marchant as the newest member of our Board of Directors!

After serving with insight and dedication on our Board of Advisors, Byron now steps into a pivotal role helping guide VigilanteX’s strategic direction and long-term growth. His deep expertise, visionary thinking, and unwavering commitment to innovation have already made a lasting impact and we’re excited to have him in this new role.

When someone outside our company takes the time to recognize one of our own, it speaks volumes. Today, we’re beaming with pride as Paul Unterhalter was publicly celebrated for his unwavering commitment to safety; and we couldn’t agree more.

https://lnkd.in/gy2MeRsy 

We’re lucky to have you on our team.

#SafetyCulture #TeamSpotlight #ThankYouPaul #WorkSafeLiveSafe #HumanFirst

🦺 Safety isn’t just a job it’s a calling.

Today, I want to recognize someone who embodies that truth: Paul Unterhalter.

Paul may not hold formal safety certifications, but his commitment to #Safety is unmatched. For over a decade, he’s worked on the front lines of injury care, supporting injured workers, collaborating with safety teams, and witnessing firsthand the cost of failure when safety breaks down.

He’s seen the fear in a worker’s eyes after a life-changing injury. He’s heard the worry in their voice, “Will I be able to provide for my family?” That kind of experience can’t be taught in a classroom. It’s earned, and it’s rare.

💬 “Safety is no accident.”

Paul doesn’t just say it, he’s lived it.

This article is a tribute to Paul’s journey and a reminder that safety professionals come from all walks of life but we’re all united by one goal: protecting people.

🙏 Thank you, Paul, for making safety personal. For being a voice for the injured, an advocate for progress, and a powerful reminder that the human element is the heartbeat of safety.

#SafetyIsNoAccident #SafetyEvolution #CommitmentToSafety #EHS #WorkplaceSafety #HumanElement #Leadership #ThankYouPaul #SafetyCulture #InjuryCare #ProtectingLives

This is what collaboration looks like.

Meet this power duo!

John (left), a brilliant AI integration specialist who makes the integration process seamless and effortless for our customers. He's highly skilled in optimizing workflows and is a superstar when it comes to making sure customers are cared for. His intuitive solutions transform how we are able to deliver fast, smart, and effective service.

George (right), the force keeping our systems strong and our field teams empowered. He is a highly effective IT & field operations manager set on resolving issues before they arise and making sure his teams have the tools they need to succeed. On any given day George is part strategist and part superhero.

Together they are redefining what innovation and excellence mean. We are so grateful to have these two on our team!

#TeamSpotlight #OperationalExcellence #TechLead

Meet Argos, the mobile surveillance unit designed to be seen and heard. When trespassers cross the line, Argos responds instantly, with flashing strobe lights and warning speakers that make it clear; this site is protected.

Even in the most remote construction zones, Argos ensures real-time deterrence and unparalleled peace of mind, powered by Starlink’s advanced satellite connectivity.

Defend your site, contact us for a demo.

#ConstructionSecurity #RemoteMonitoring #SiteProtection

We’re excited to welcome Ed M. as Chief Financial Officer at VigilanteX!

Ed is a high-impact executive with global experience in finance, risk, strategy, and operations—across industries like fintech, cybersecurity, SaaS, and more. He’s helped companies scale, transform, and lead through disruption.

His leadership will be key as VigilanteX continues to grow and execute on our bold vision.

Welcome aboard, Ed!

#Leadership #CFO #VigilanteX #Cybersecurity #Growth #ExecutiveTeam

$5.6 billion. That’s the annual cost of injuries in 2024 from falls to a lower level on U.S. construction sites, a staggering number that reflects not just lost productivity, but lives changed forever.

Falls remain the leading cause of death in construction, and it’s time we tackle it with smarter solutions.

Our AI-enabled Argos units are redefining site safety by:

•Detecting fall risks in real time before they become incidents

•Providing 360° visibility in dynamic environments

•Helping teams respond faster and make proactive decisions

We’re not just reducing costs, we’re preventing tragedies. Because behind every dollar lost is a worker who didn’t make it home safely.

Let’s build smarter. Let’s build safer.

#ConstructionSafety #AIInTech #WorkplaceSafety #FallPrevention #InnovationInConstruction #SafetyFirst

Site security is a necessity.

Construction zones house valuable equipment, sensitive materials, and ongoing operations that are vulnerable to unauthorized access. Trespassing not only poses safety hazards, but also exposes projects to theft, vandalism, and costly delays.

Argos is enabled with AI to achieve real-time monitoring that protects your site 24/7. Let’s build safer, smarter, and more secure environments together.

#ConstructionSecurity #SecureTheSite #AccessControl #JobsiteSafety #RiskMitigation

🦺 Safety isn’t just a job it’s a calling.

Today, I want to recognize someone who embodies that truth: Paul Unterhalter.

Paul may not hold formal safety certifications, but his commitment to #Safety is unmatched. For over a decade, he’s worked on the front lines of injury care, supporting injured workers, collaborating with safety teams, and witnessing firsthand the cost of failure when safety breaks down.

He’s seen the fear in a worker’s eyes after a life-changing injury. He’s heard the worry in their voice, “Will I be able to provide for my family?” That kind of experience can’t be taught in a classroom. It’s earned, and it’s rare.

💬 “Safety is no accident.”

Paul doesn’t just say it, he’s lived it.

This article is a tribute to Paul’s journey and a reminder that safety professionals come from all walks of life but we’re all united by one goal: protecting people.

🙏 Thank you, Paul, for making safety personal. For being a voice for the injured, an advocate for progress, and a powerful reminder that the human element is the heartbeat of safety.

#SafetyIsNoAccident #SafetyEvolution #CommitmentToSafety #EHS #WorkplaceSafety #HumanElement #Leadership #ThankYouPaul #SafetyCulture #InjuryCare #ProtectingLives

This is what collaboration looks like.

John (left), a brilliant AI integration specialist who makes the integration process seamless and effortless for our customers. He's highly skilled in optimizing workflows and is a superstar when it comes to making sure customers are cared for. His intuitive solutions transform how we are able to deliver fast, smart, and effective service.

George (right), the force keeping our systems strong and our field teams empowered. He is a highly effective IT & field operations manager set on resolving issues before they arise and making sure his teams have the tools they need to succeed. On any given day George is part strategist and part superhero.

Together they are redefining what innovation and excellence mean. We are so grateful to have these two on our team!

#TeamSpotlight #OperationalExcellence #TechLead

Even in the most remote construction zones, Argos ensures real-time deterrence and unparalleled peace of mind, powered by Starlink’s advanced satellite connectivity.

Defend your site, contact us for a demo.

Ed is a high-impact executive with global experience in finance, risk, strategy, and operations—across industries like fintech, cybersecurity, SaaS, and more. He’s helped companies scale, transform, and lead through disruption.

His leadership will be key as VigilanteX continues to grow and execute on our bold vision.

Welcome aboard, Ed!

#Leadership #CFO #VigilanteX #Cybersecurity #Growth #ExecutiveTeam

$5.6 billion. That’s the annual cost of injuries in 2024 from falls to a lower level on U.S. construction sites, a staggering number that reflects not just lost productivity, but lives changed forever.

Falls remain the leading cause of death in construction, and it’s time we tackle it with smarter solutions.

Our AI-enabled Argos units are redefining site safety by:

•Detecting fall risks in real time before they become incidents

•Providing 360° visibility in dynamic environments

•Helping teams respond faster and make proactive decisions

We’re not just reducing costs, we’re preventing tragedies. Because behind every dollar lost is a worker who didn’t make it home safely.

Let’s build smarter. Let’s build safer.

#ConstructionSafety #AIInTech #WorkplaceSafety #FallPrevention #InnovationInConstruction #SafetyFirst

Site security is a necessity.

Construction zones house valuable equipment, sensitive materials, and ongoing operations that are vulnerable to unauthorized access. Trespassing not only poses safety hazards, but also exposes projects to theft, vandalism, and costly delays.

Argos is enabled with AI to achieve real-time monitoring that protects your site 24/7. Let’s build safer, smarter, and more secure environments together.

#ConstructionSecurity #SecureTheSite #AccessControl #JobsiteSafety #RiskMitigation

Subcontractors face up to 11% more injuries — yet they’re the least monitored on site.

Subcontractor crews who make up the bulk of boots on the ground face higher injury rates than the primes who hire them. And yet, their incidents often go unseen, undocumented, or unaddressed until it's too late.

It’s not about blame. It’s about visibility.

Because what you don’t see still happens. Still costs. Still hurts.

That’s where Video AI Agents come into play and help surface moments like restricted zone entries or equipment near-misses — that would otherwise slip through the cracks.

VigilanteX

While growing up in Baltimore, I never dreamed of doing the things I have been able to do throughout my life. I have been truly blessed to have a loving family, world class friends and the fortune through my service to work with and lead some of the most amazing humans on the planet. I am equally blessed to now be able to work with more amazing people here VigilanteX. It starts with the founders and reverberates throughout the organization with a strong culture as we continue to introduce our Argos site intelligence platforms to not only gain organizational efficiencies but more importantly help organizations save lives and get people home to their loved ones every day.
updates.reshared_post_description:
Sometimes you chase a dream, and sometimes your dream finds a new path you never saw coming.

From the moment Brian Cavanaugh learned his ABCs, he dreamed of becoming an engineer. His plan was clear; apply to college, earn his degree, and build a future for his family. He only had one school on his mind, Duke University. He sent off his application and waited.

Months passed when the letter finally arrived: Accepted! Not only that, but he had also earned partial scholarships in both lacrosse and wrestling. For a moment, his dreams felt within reach.

Then reality hit.

As the middle child of a single mother already putting two older sisters through college with a younger sister not far behind, financial hardship made affording tuition almost impossible, even with those scholarships. Brian knew sacrifices had to be made.

Then the day came when a West Point recruiter knocked on his door. Which opened doors to also learn about the United States Naval Academy. Intrigued, hopeful, and with the caring influence of his mother, he applied. He received an acceptance letter and everything changed. He now had a path towards his dream degree and a career in the United States Marine Corps.

Brian earned his degree in Mechanical Engineering, married the love of his life, and started a family. Through grit and relentless effort, he rose in rank, embracing leadership and building a legacy rooted in service and dedication.
Overcoming adversity brought new perspectives, “Struggle helps you grow as you learn to deal with adversity. Much like “practice makes you perfect,” as you have struggle and work your way through it, you’ll come out stronger on the other side.” He reflects.

Today, as CEO of VigilanteX, Brian’s journey is more than inspiring, it’s transformative. When asked about his transition from the military to his new role he shared, “I believe the leadership principles are the same despite the “mission” differences. The overall experience has been favorable and my intent to add value every day is being accomplished.”

His grit, empathy, and strategic foresight are setting the tone for a company rooted in resilience and innovation. Having lived through challenge and adaptation, he champions a culture where every team member is empowered to lead, grow, and chase bold ideas without fear of failure.

Under his guidance, VigilanteX isn’t just building cutting-edge solutions, we’re cultivating a mission driven team that values character as much as capability. His leadership is shaping a future where purpose fuels progress and where success is measured by both impact and integrity.

Although there are many types of leaders, Brian is an exceptional one.

“There are several qualities that make a great leader with emotional intelligence being at the top. You must have empathy and a general understanding of people to ensure their success and ultimately the success of your organization.” – Brian Cavanaugh

Construction theft isn’t just a nuisance - it’s a billion dollar crisis.
 
Every year, job sites across the U.S. lose an estimated $1 billion to theft. From heavy machinery to essential tools and high-value materials like copper and lumber, nothing is safe. Shockingly, 85% of these thefts go unreported, and only a fraction of stolen equipment is ever recovered.

And here’s the kicker: many sites still lack basic security measures, like cameras.

This isn’t just about stolen property - it’s about delays, safety risks, and increased costs that ultimately impact every stakeholder in the construction process.

If you're in the construction industry, what are you seeing on your sites? Have you implemented successful strategies to combat this?
Let’s start the conversation. 🔒🏗️
 
#ConstructionSafety #TheftPrevention #JobsiteSecurity #IndustryInsight

His approach is thoughtful, grounded in real-world field experience, and built on a deep understanding of how to protect people while keeping operations moving.

As we continue to grow our presence in the energy sector, we’re grateful to have Doyle onboard to help guide our efforts with clarity and purpose.

This is what fewer injuries really means for your bottom line.

During Safety Month, let’s connect the dots:
 Fewer incidents → fewer claims → fewer costs.

AI-driven safety tools are helping companies reduce lost time injuries by 40% — without needing to hire a full-time $300K injury prevention team.

Because when someone gets hurt, the costs stack up fast:
Medical bills
Lost productivity and wages
Overtime coverage
Transitional duty
And sometimes, multi-million dollar litigation

Workplace safety isn’t proven in playback — it’s proven in fewer injuries, lower costs, and teams that go home safe.

#NationalSafetyMonth #SafetyMonth

At VigilanteX, safety is a top priority. It isn't just a checklist, it's a mindset.

This month is a great time to think about our safety practices and encourage conversations on safety. With Argos on your side, you have an extra teammate to keep your site safe. Every safe choice, no matter how small, builds trust, culture, and ensures that we hold each other accountable.

Because when safety comes first, everyone wins.

The security guard of 2025 is part human, part Silicon

AI headlines fixate on 15 Million white-collar roles, yet the next frontier is where code meets concrete. Nowhere is that clearer than in physical security.

Visit a construction site, big-box lot, or substation today and you’ll still see a lone guard pacing, a wall of monitors flickering in a back room, and a radio that crackles only after something goes wrong. The U.S. employs 1.3 Million private guards in this reactive model.

Now fast-forward to 2025. The security guard is flanked by an always-awake AI partner: cameras that don’t just record, but reason; software that doesn’t just alert, but engages and deters in real-time; and a digital command center that tracks every feed, policy and response playbook in real-time.

At Spot AI we call this blended force the AI Security Guard. This hybrid model is eclipsing yesterday’s “boots-only” approach.

This has many benefits, particularly for large operators with a large location footprint.
1. Multiply your workforce: Get more coverage with AI that doesn’t get distracted or fatigued and can analyze every frame from 100s of camera concurrently.
2. Re-value talent: Humans shift from passive watching to high-judgement tasks: engaging customers, coordinating law enforcement, resolving edge cases.
3.Feed the boardroom with data: Every incident, near miss, and false alarm rolls into a unified dataset that informs staffing, insurance, and CapEx decisions.

The impact is tangible. Across 50+ sites Spot AI has deployed with our partner VigilanteX, the human-AI team surfaced and resolved 600+ safety and security events within the first quarter of deployment—events that would have otherwise drained profit or shut down operations.

The security guard of 2025 is the blueprint for how AI will elevate every blue-collar role: augment the human, weaponize the data, and turn a cost centre into a source of strategic advantage. The world of Physical AI is here.

Vigilantex is excited to welcome BF Marchant to our Board of Advisors. Byron brings decades of leadership experience, including serving as CEO of the U.S. Naval Academy Alumni Association and Foundation for over 13 years. He is a former Naval officer, accomplished attorney, and currently the Owner and CEO of BFM Seaward LLC. Byron serves on multiple public and private boards, including the board of Exelon Baltimore Gas and Electric (NYSE) and as Development Chairman of the U.S. Naval War College Board. Byron’s deep expertise in governance, capital fundraising, strategy, and nonprofit leadership will be invaluable as we grow.

Matt’s impressive track record—ranging from combat-tested Marine aviator to CEO of an advanced engineering powerhouse—makes him a powerhouse addition to our team. We look forward to the guidance he’ll bring as we push boundaries in national security and tech innovation.

We're not building AI to impress Silicon Valley. We're building it for the people who make America work.

90% of our economy runs on the physical world - the manufacturing floors, warehouses, and hospitals where frontline heroes deserve the best technology.

Yesterday at #GoogleCloudNext, our CEO Rish Gupta launched Iris - a Video AI Agent builder that lets anyone talk to their security cameras just like they'd chat with an AI assistant.

No coding. No technical skills. Just conversation. What used to take months and a team of engineers now takes minutes and simple instructions.

This isn't just about efficiency—it's about giving the backbone of our economy the tools they've never had.
